alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Gordon; Murray; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 2:26PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Murray, northeastern Floyd and Gordon Counties through 315 PM EST... At 226 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Everett Springs, or near Calhoun, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Calhoun, Resaca, Plainville, Fairmount, Ranger, Carters, Sonoraville, Oostanaula, Redbud, Lake Marvin, Audubon, Sugar Valley, Oakman, Everett Springs and Nickelsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
